name: Hero Of the Slumber
description:
Story:

once upon a time: a kingdom got attacked by an evil wizard

the knights of the kingdom fought valiantly
but the evil wizard had a different plan.

he put the entire kingdom to sleep,
but. one citizen managed to escape...

on a path, to release his people
from the infinite slumber...

he sets forward to the evil wizard's tower...

The player uses magic to complete puzzles and fight off enemies

The game was made WITHOUT any text

so things might be a little confusing

thus all the way at the bottom you will find the controls

but firstly give it a try without the controll list

Controls:

wasd to move

arrow keys to use runes

space to use attack with 4 selected runes

(runes need to be combined in order for them to work)

escape to reset runes / go back to level selection
